TopicTitle: A "What-Not-To-Suggest" list in the Steam forums

Articles.Content:
There's no subforum for Steam, so I thought I'd just put this here, since if I put it in the Forum Forum nobody would ever find it. Everywhere I look on the Steam discussion boards for KSP, there's "this game needs multiplayer" and "more solar systems" everywhere. There needs to be some sort of "Do Not Suggest" post stickied to the top of the board, because the only thing in the FAQ regarding things you shouldn't suggest is multiplayer, and nobody seems to read the FAQ. The post would include all the normal things:

  • Multiplayer
  • Female Kerbals
  • Cities
  • Budget
  • Multiplayer
  • Life support and food
  • More solar systems
  • Multiplayer
  • Weapons
  • Aliens
  • Achievements (Steam or otherwise)
  • Multiplayer

And perhaps various other things, like:

  • Plants
  • More things to do in EVA
  • Telescopes
  • More parts

I sincerely hope that this can be put on the Steam forums and stickied as soon as possible. We're being buried in multiplayer requests here.
A common trend seems to be multiplayer. I agree that everything in the list should not be suggested.

given that 99% of stuff on Steam are MMOs and similar shoot'm up games...

Maybe Squad should put in the readme a reference about preliminary multiplayer code optimizations. We all know the people who really hit the suggestions forum read that, and would probably get the hint.

Edit: This topic has been closed as it involves a Steam forum issue which could be solved by PMing one of the KSP forum mods or admins. I'll pass this request on to our staff to see if we can get a copy of the "Do not Suggest" thread posted on Steam, thank you.
